articles.title: Politics latest news: Rishi Sunak tells the rich to give £400 energy grant to charity
articles.description: Rishi Sunak has suggested wealthy people who do not need financial assistance from the Government to pay their rising energy bills should donate a new £400 handout to charity.
articles.content:
Rishi Sunak, the Chancellor, said that if wealthy households do not need the Government's £400 energy bill grant they should donate it to charity - and that is what he will be doing. 
Mr Sunak was a… [+1149 chars]
